titles: An elegy on that great example of heroick valour the right honourable, Edvvard Earl of Sandvvich.
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Within mourning borders, with emblems and motto at head and foot.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Sandwich, Edward Montagu, --  Earl of, 1625-1672 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
